p: Between MM_LP and ww_LP, DE lncRNA targeted mRNAs were associated with pathways such as olfactory transduction, gap junction and thyroid hormone signaling pathway (Fig.Â 6a, Supplementary material 7C). With regard to DE mRNAs, which were enriched in ubiquitin mediated proteolysis, vasopressin-regulated water reabsorption, non-homologous end-joining and cell cycle (Fig. 6b, Supplementary material 8C).
